explains: n. 控制股权收购；公司收购
wordGroup: leveraged buyout [经]融资收买；融资买入

sentences.en: It is thought that a management buyout is one option.
sentences.cn: 管理权收购被认为是一个选择。

sentences.en: I was looking for a backer to assist me in the attempted buyout.
sentences.cn: 我当时正在寻找一位赞助人来帮助我进行这次全面收购。

sentences.en: But Yahoo may not be able to avoid a buyout by Microsoft.
sentences.cn: 但雅虎可能避免不了微软对其的收购。
